name: cypress-react-selector
description: cypress plugin to locate react elements by component, props and state

scripts.release:major:git: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor:git: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch:git: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags

author: Abhinaba Ghosh <askabhinaba@gmail.com>
